column4: I have a bcm43** wireless card, and after a kernel upgrade it doesn't work.  Network-manager sees my wifi, and a few others, but it can't connect to my wifi.  I did the ndiswrapper setup script from ubunuguide.org, but no luck.  Any ideas?
yeah, I replaced it with that though, it did show my ssid though
k so the wireless is working
can you disable wep and try again?
yeah, network manager sees it, and others, the others are weak though, mine is wpa
one sec, I'll probably sign out, since it reboots the internet after doing that
